title: Poster, "Washington DC", 1980
inscribed: Imprinted in black, lower left: [logo CIAT] 14th General Assembly of the Inter-American Center of Tax Administrators  June 22-27, 1980
description: On a cream ground, black silhouetted portraits of men, including Abraham Lincoln; signatures surround their heads. Above in red and blue: WASHINGTON DC.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Washington DC", 1980. Lithograph on paper. Gift of Various Donors. 1981-29-348.
